Name: Battle Imagine - Void Bzzar
Description:
Activates or advances Void Bzzar's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Transform into Bee.

Stunt! Transform into Bee
Transform into Elite: Void Bzzar for a period of time, during which you can release stings and projectiles.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
